title: Award-Winning Luxury at Lake Taupo
description: Always wanted to stay in a fairytale castle, but never had the chance? Luxury Escapes is taking you to the awe-inspiring, uber-luxury The Lodge at Kinloch Club, a modern-day vision of Scotland's Kinloch Castle. Spend three remarkable nights at this luxurious lodge - designed by multi-award-winning architect Andrew Patterson - on the shores of Lake Taupo, and enjoy two rounds of golf at New Zealand's number one golf course, The Kinloch Club - a Jack Nicklaus signature club, daily breakfast, free-flow canapés, pre-dinner drinks and nightly dinners.

title: Exclusive Luxury Lodge in Nature’s Ultimate Playground with Fine-Dining Inclusions
description: Experience a unique stay fit for royalty, at the awe-inspiring, uber-luxurious Kinloch Manor and Villas, a modern-day vision of Scotland's Kinloch Castle. Retreat to this luxurious lodge, designed by multi-award-winning architect Andrew Patterson and part of the exclusive Luxury Lodges of New Zealand. Located on the shores of Lake Taupo, you'll be treated to indulgent dining including daily breakfast, nightly free-flow canapés and pre-dinner drinks, sumptuous nightly five-course degustation dinners and your choice of either a bottle of Bollinger Champagne or a round of golf at New Zealand's number one golf course, The Kinloch Club - a Jack Nicklaus signature club.

title: Five-Star Lake Taupo Apartment Stay on the Lakefront
description: Glittering views of Lake Taupo await at the lakefront Sacred Waters Taupo Luxury Apartments, a five-star escape on New Zealand's largest lake. Between moments enjoying your own private thermal mineral hot tub and the lake's spellbinding views, make use of the outdoor lap pool, keep up your workout regime at the well-equipped gym, or hire a complimentary bicycle and glide along the lake's perimetre to the charming local township.
offer_address: 225 Lake Terrace, Waipahihi, Taupo 3330, New Zealand

title: Five-Star Lake Taupo Apartment Stay on the Lakefront
description: Glittering views of Lake Taupo await at the lakefront Taupo Sacred Waters Luxury Lakefront Apartments, a five-star escape on New Zealand's largest lake. Between moments enjoying your own private thermal mineral hot tub and the lake's spellbinding views, make use of the outdoor lap pool, keep up your workout regime at the well-equipped gym, or hire a complimentary bicycle and along the lake's perimetre to the charming local township.
offer_address: 225 Lake Terrace, Waipahihi, Taupo 3330, New Zealand

title: Renowned New Zealand Riverside Lodge with Top-Shelf Wine Cellar, Airport Transfers, Daily Gourmet Meals and Aperitifs
description: Between stunning mountain peaks and the mighty Waikato River stands the ultra-boutique Huka Lodge, one of the world’s most renowned luxury retreats, celebrated by guests including the late Queen Elizabeth II. Heritage Edwardian sophistication, sublime surroundings and vivid Māori cultural flourishes weave together to create an opulent escape unlike anything else - a thorough commitment to outstanding service and a world-class culinary team only further elevate the experience. As twilight lazily unfurls upon Huka Lodge’s flawless gardens, retreat to exquisite suppers backed by New Zealand’s finest local produce and allow the house sommeliers at the sprawling, subterranean wine cellar to curate the perfect vintage tasting as accompaniment.
offer_address: 271 Huka Falls Road, Wairakei, Taupo 3377, New Zealand

title: North Island Lake Taupo Self-Contained Villas with Private Pool
description: Escape to the shores of New Zealand's pristine Lake Taupo and be treated to a relaxed stay at The Point Villas, an exclusive estate framed by 85 acres of native bushland with sweeping mountain views of Ruapehu, Tongariro, Ngauruhoe and Pihanga from the property. Explore the incredible natural wonders of Lake Taupo located mere moments from your doorstep or admire your surroundings from your luxury, light-filled villa. Each villa offers the feeling of total seclusion by perfectly blending into the surroundings, and has been perfectly crafted to bring the best of the outdoors inside with floor-to-ceiling windows. Step onto the large sun-soaked terrace, dive into your very own private pool, or cook up a storm in your villa's fully equipped kitchen (you can even request the services of a private chef). Spend your days doing as little or as much as you please, and take advantage of the endless ways to fill your day, such as kayaking, swimming, tennis, croquet or bushwalking.
offer_address: 24A & B Whakamoenga Point, Taupō 3351, New Zealand
